summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 4136 lux), and cloud levels (up 536 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1467 m), light levels (up 6449 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 535.7m lower than yesterday, 1041.3m lower than past week, 1466.5m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 860m and a high of 3110m, averaging 1337.7m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Changeable conditions.
